howToUse.label: How to use
howToUse.title: How to Convert Multiple Images to PDF Online?
howToUse.subtitle: The process of converting images to PDF is very simple and can be completed in just a few clicks.

step1.label: 1.Upload Images
step1.title: 1.Upload Images
step1.description: Upload one or more PNG images to our PNG to PDF converter.

step2.label: 2.Convert to PDF
step2.title: 2.Convert to PDF
step2.description: Click the 'Convert to PDF' button to start the conversion process.

step3.label: 3.Download PDF Files
step3.title: 3.Download PDF Files
step3.description: Once completed, the PDF file will be automatically downloaded.

features.title: What Are Features of PNG to PDF Converter?
features.subtitle: More than 300k users choose to use our Image to PDF converter because of its outstanding features.

feature1.title: Convert Images to PDF File in 1 Second
feature1.description: Upload one or multiple images and get a ready-to-use PDF in just about one second. Our Image to PDF tool ensures lightning-fast conversion with a seamless, WYSIWYG experience.

feature2.title: Image to PDF Converter Supports Multiple Image Formats
feature2.description: Image to PDF converter fully supports common image formats such as Webp, JPG, PNG, BMP, etc., meeting the needs of multi-scene conversion and making operation easier.

feature3.title: Create Printable PDF with Image-to-PDF Tool
feature3.description: After you have created multiple images, you can directly use our Image to PDF converter to make a PDF document. This is simple and convenient, without having to find a separate PDF converter. Seamless connection, improve 10x efficiency.

testimonials.title: User Testimonials About Image to PDF Converter
testimonials.subtitle: Many users have highly praised our image to PDF tool after using it.

testimonial1.content: I uploaded over a dozen images and the conversion was done in less than two seconds—super fast! The PDF layout was clean and the image quality remained intact. Really great user experience.

testimonial2.content: I tested images in different formats, including PNG and TIFF, and everything converted smoothly. No registration required, no ads, and the interface is clean—perfect for everyday office use.

testimonial3.content: I often collect line drawings for my kid, and this tool lets me turn them into printable PDFs in one click. Super convenient for making children's coloring books.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have a question? We're here to help. Still looking for answers? Visit our Support Center.

q1.question: What is image to PDF converter?
q1.answer: It is an online file converter designed to convert multiple images into PDF files according to the specified page size.

q2.question: What image formats can I convert?
q2.answer: Almost all image formats are supported, including but not limited to Webp, JPG, and PNG.

q3.question: Can I adjust the layout of the PDF?
q3.answer: Of course, you can adjust the page size, usually A4, and you can also adjust the page layout.

q4.question: Can I upload multiple images at once?
q4.answer: Of course, you can upload 1 picture, or you can upload 10 pictures at once. Just choose the photos to upload according to your needs.

q5.question: Can I try your image to converter for free?
q5.answer: Of course, we provide online services completely free of charge, 100% free to use.
